name: Defender
description: Allows a player to parry or block an attack for an ally with a penalty of %d.

name: Tough nut
description: The character can ignore the firs %d penalty that results from wounds or critical injuries.

name: Divert
description: Reduces the duration of a parry by one tick. This does nor allow to go below the minimal reaction duration of 2 ticks.

name: Suppression fire
description: Make a regular attack check. If successful the target suffers a penalty of 4 on attacks until the attacker acts again. The attacker might perform an attack of opportunity if the target moves or attacks while suppressed.

name: Sweeping blow
description: Declare a number of targets in melee range. Make an attack with a penalty that equals the number of targets. Each target can defend individually. The target that got hit suffer half the weapon damage.

name: Charge
description: Combine a movement with an attack by making an attack with a penalty of 4. If the attack is successful add your half your agility to the damage.

name: Overthrow
description: Make an attack with a penalty of 2. If successful the target suffers half the damage but falls prone.

name: Disarm
description: Make an attack with a penalty of 4. If successful the target does not get damaged but drops his weapon. Use the dexterity skill to defend against this attack.

name: Forceful blow
description: Make an attack with a penalty of 2 and 2 ticks increased duration. Increase the damage of the attack by 3.

name: Vital hit
description: Attack with a penalty of 4 which allows you to spend effects on the damage to inflict an additional critical injury.

name: Target weak spot
description: Attack with a penalty of 2 to give your attack the pierce quality.

name: Shatter cover
description: Make a regular attack with a heavy weapon on a cover to destroy the cover. Depending on the type of cover the GM might require a certain number of quality levels. If the cover is destroyed the character behind suffers half the weapons damage.

name: Overload weapon
description: Doubles the damage of an energy weapon but also doubles the duration for usage.

name: Traversing fire
description: Use an automatic rifle to shoot a wide burst. Any additionally used round increases the attack duration by one but the target also suffers a defence penalty of one.

name: Feint
description: Increase the difficulty of a melee attack by 2 to deal a defence penalty of 4. The attack also needs 2 additional ticks.

name: Detonate
description: Overload the core of an energy weapon to work as explosive.

name: Ironhide
description: The attacker needs %d additional effects to inflict a critical hit.

name: Sturdy hand
description: Reduce the penalty for shooting into close combat with an ally by %d.

name: Eagle eye
description: Reduce the penalty for long and extreme range attacks by %d.

name: Quickload
description: Reloading a projectile or energy weapon is 2 ticks faster and counts as immediate action.

name: Quickdraw
description: Draw a weapon 2 ticks faster and as immediate action.

name: Cover expert
description: Increase the penalty for attackers by %d when taking cover.

name: Prepare for impact
description: Use the defence to increase the armor by two instead of avoiding the attack.

name: Evade
description: Make an athletics check to reduce incoming area damage by one + quality levels.

name: Dual wield
description: After a successful attack with the main hand the character might perform an attack with the offhand for half the duration that suffers a penalty of %d. The slower weapon always counts as main hand.

name: Combat reflexes
description: Increase the base difficulty for attack checks against the character by %d.
